Effect_On_Aircraft/Crew: Reduced schedule and safety margins (pressure on crew/ground staff, increased risk of procedural deviations and errors)
Mitigations: Publication QC (peer/safety review, configuration checks) + automated runtime data freshness/consistency checks + ERP for critical discrepancies
Notes: Linked to CCA (stale/incorrect data ingestion), FTA nodes (A1.1, A2.1, B1.1, B3.1), ERP for rollback/bulletins. See AMPEL360-02-00-02-002A (CCA), AMPEL360-02-00-02-005A (FTA), AMPEL360-02-00-02-003A (ERP).
